h2_title: Where To Use The Pungent Flesh Chunk in Black Myth: Wukong
content: If you kill the boss without destroying the wall, extremely strong attacks from yourself can also destroy it. However, you will need to use one of the Transformation Spells, specifically Red Tides, as they have the strength to make an impact on the wall.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pungent_Flesh_Chunk.md', within the main section titled 'Pungent Flesh Chunk', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use The Pungent Flesh Chunk in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
If you kill the boss without destroying the wall, extremely strong attacks from yourself can also destroy it. However, you will need to use one of the Transformation Spells, specifically Red Tides, as they have the strength to make an impact on the wall.
